abstract: Prime Min Chamberlain cites Allies purchase of current catch of Norway's oil, Commons
snippet: Drastic Allied economic warfare through trade pacts limiting neutrals' exports to Germany and through widespread buying to keep materials from the Reich was announced yesterday by Prime Minister Chamberlain, ......

headline.main: REICH TO BE PINCHED HARD BY BLOCKADE, CHAMBERLAIN SAYS; Six New Pacts With Neutrals Curb Exports to Germany, British Leader Discloses HINTS AT NAVAL MEASURES Prime Minister Declares That the Allies Rule Out 'DoubleStandard' Neutrality

lead_paragraph: Drastic Allied economic warfare through trade pacts limiting neutrals' exports to Germany and through widespread buying to keep materials from the Reich was announced yesterday by Prime Minister Chamberlain, ...
